description:
Pompoms are like the cherry on the top of Sunday, they just make things better. Topped with a large pompom, the Camper Jr is a cozy toque with a strong retro vibe.

  • Fine acrylic yarns are soft on sensitive skin
  • Stretch fleece lining holds onto warmth and wicks away moisture
  • Cuffed design adds and extra layer of warmth where it is needed most
name: Kombi Camper Jr Pompom - Youths
